content: EDR Visit meera motors to handover one df docus and discuss more cf files and car listing. Repayment recd from vighanharta motors. Repayment recd from m.r.motors borivali. EDR followup repayment of decent carz to complete soon. Promise to pay very soon. Followup repayment of aarya cars will pay by 2maro evening. 2 files rejected by bankars not upto the mark. 2 files under process 1 docus of each file pending will revieve 2maro chances for approval. 2nd half i was in hospital for my retina green lager surgery. Thanks regards

Visit meera motors to collect one df docus and discuss about cf files and car listing. Visit aarya cars to handover one df docus and discuss about files and car listing. Followup 3 files under process with bankers and dealers Followup other dealers to get new files Followup dream car hub but he did not pickup the phone i was in meera road only then i called up police inspector i told him everything and requist him to issue FIR he said come in monday.

EDR Visit aarya cars yo handover one df docus. One file approved may be 2maro will be disburse. Followup 3 files under process with bankars Followup repayment with decent carz.
